text: Marina Razum (born 25 February 1992) is a Croatian handball player for MKS Lublin and the Croatian national team.EHF profile She participated at the 2016 European Women's Handball Championship.2016 European Championship roster ==References== Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:Croatian female handball players Category:Sportspeople from Zagreb Category:Expatriate handball players Category:Croatian expatriate sportspeople in Romania Category:Croatian expatriates in Poland
title: Marina Razum
